is_numeric: This function returns whether a given variable is a numeric value (real, int32, int64 or boolean) or not. In some cases you want to check and see if a variable in GameMaker Studio 2 holds any numeric value, and that's when you would use this function. The function will return <tt>true</tt> if the given input is numeric, and <tt>false</tt> otherwise.
The above code checks the variable "val" to see if it is a numeric value and if it is it then adds it to the given variable.
